name: BUG BUSTER
description:
Please use fullscreen when playing!!!

FIGHT AN ENDLESS HORDE OF BUGS IN THIS ARCADE BEAT-EM UP.

A/S/D = DODGE ATTACKS

K/L = PUNCH THE CRAP OUT OF BUGS!

Made in 72 hours for the WOWIE 2.0 game jam. The theme for this jam was: Intentional Bugs.

*note*: When you see the bug "Devils music", the game is supposed to play the soundtrack backwords. However, browsers only suport positive pitch numbers in unity, so it just mutes the soundtrack instead.
